questions.quote: Yes, I told him all about you going and he got all excited and decided to go.
Oh, this isn't even B.O.! This is *beyond* B.O.! It's *B*.B.O.!
Yeah, well you have to maintain the same disposition too. You can't start acting any differently. You have to be nice.
Yeah I guess. So you wanna meet at that place at seven thirty?
Elaine! Excellent. I'd like you to meet a friend of mine, Irwin Lubeck.
I know it's not what the ladies like. But without some solid sack time, I'm a zombie.
Oh, yeah... Puddy. Well, I won't fire him until I see if this new guy can... handle the workload.
I don't think we should. We really don't know each other very well.
"Euh.. Fine , good , yeah! Just been occupying myself with some of your....hem reading material."
So I set up a screening, everyone takes their shirt off and click, I snap me a shot of a bear-chested Kruger.
